Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Suite in D minor, HWV 449

c. 1705

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 23'

  • 1. Prélude
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Sarabande
  • 5. Aria con variazioni
  • 6. Giga
  • 7. Menuet

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/17 · BA 4032 · Klavierwerke IV / Einzelne Suiten und Stücke, Zweite Folge · ed. Terence Best
  • Associated Board · Selected Keyboard Works, Book 1 · ed. Richard Jones [mov. 7]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4223 · Klavierwerke IV / Einzelne Suiten und Stücke, Zweite Folge · ed. Terence Best
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50118b · Klavierwerke I, Teil b · ed. Peter Williams

1. Prélude

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Allemande

The allemande is also used in the suite in G minor (HWV 451).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. Courante

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Sarabande

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

5. Aria con variazioni

The aria is followed by seven variations. This movement was later revised and used in the suite in D minor (HWV 428).

Duration: 10' 30"

Difficulty: 2

6. Giga

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2

7. Menuet

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5
